html.p: To get these programs, drag the program's title from your web-browser to your installer. If you need more help, consult the installation instructions.

This pages used to list all the known feeds, but the list was getting much too long, so now it just shows a few selected applications. Hopefully, other people will set up more specialised lists for particular groups of people.
For example, the ROX Zero Install software index lists those programs which are designed for use with the ROX desktop.
For a complete list of all known feeds, see the feed mirror site.
If you want to make additional programs available this way, please read the packaging guide.
